page.title: 09Recreation - the Butley Area
page.content:
A survey of 100 people of all ages revealed the following statistics:
51 people watched more than 14hrs. T.V. per week! 6 in Uniformed Youth Organisations. 48 worked in their gardens. 30 used the Village Hall. 27 read for more than 7hrs. per week. 7 were in the Women's Institute. 11 used the Public Houses. 17 went to Church and 5 to Sunday School. 8 were involved in School Support Groups. 4 Bingo - 5 Fishing - 4 Football 3 Quoits -3 Cricket - 1 Bowls 2 Sailing - 5 Swimming - 4 Keep Fit 1 Badminton - 2 Dance/Drama 2 were involved in the Parish Council. 2 in Senior Citizen's Club 2 in Air Base Clubs.
